entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
